headline: Seagate (STX) Is Up 17.8% After AI-Fueled Q2 Beat And Long-Term HAMR Demand Visibility
summary: In late January 2026, Seagate Technology Holdings reported fiscal second-quarter results showing higher sales of US$2,825 million and net income of US$593 million compared with the prior year, reaffirmed its US$0.74 quarterly dividend, issued third-quarter revenue guidance around US$2.90 billion, and filed a US$6.63 billion shelf registration for 14,850,686 ordinary shares related to its ESOP. Management linked the strong quarter and forward outlook to intense AI- and data center-driven...
